changelog.description: - `pageTopPadding` theme constant for consistent page layouts - All feature views now use dedicated top padding (32pt) for better visual consistency - Permissions page now uses consistent header styling (fonts, spacing) matching other views - Permissions refresh button now uses GlassActionButton component like other pages - NavigationSectionTests updated to include all 10 navigation sections
- Initial release with full feature set - Sparkle integration for seamless updates
